articles.description: Kyle Knoyle's fierce strike gave Doncaster Rovers all three points away to Newport County.
articles.content: Kyle Knoyle's fierce strike gave Doncaster Rovers all three points away to Newport County.Both sides went close before Knoyle settled the contest just shy of the hour mark with his first goal of the … [+879 chars]

articles.author: Jacob Ranson
articles.title: Brazil star Rodrygo posts SEVEN tweet apology for missing a penalty in defeat to Croatia - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Real Madrid star stepped up to take Brazil's first penalty in the shootout which followed extra-time of the 1-1 draw with Croatia. The 21-year-old failed to beat goalkeeper Dominik Livakovic.
articles.content:
Brazil forward Rodrygo has publicly apologised for missing a penalty as his country were dumped out of the 2022 World Cup with a 4-2 penalty shoot-out defeat to Croatia.
The Real Madrid star stepped… [+2496 chars]
